response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age", "low", "Being a young adult (19 years old) is generally associated with higher risk of recidivism due to brain development and life experience."),
    ("Gender", "low", "Gender alone does not significantly predict recidivism, but males tend to have slightly higher rates than females."),
    ("Ethnicity", "low", "White ethnicity does not significantly predict recidivism, but some studies show slightly lower rates compared to other races."),
    ("Arrests and Convictions", "high", "Having been arrested twice and convicted indicates a history of criminal behavior, which is a strong predictor of recidivism."),
    ("Marital Status", "low", "Being unmarried does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Living Arrangement", "low", "Living alone does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Education Level", "high", "Not having a high school diploma or GED and not being enrolled in college is associated with higher risk of recidivism."),
    ("Employment History", "medium", "Having held only one job during the year suggests instability, which can be a risk factor for recidivism."),
    ("Substance Use", "high", "Past and current drug use (marijuana and cocaine) is strongly associated with increased risk of recidivism."),
    ("Mental Health", "high", "Feeling persistently down or depressed can indicate mental health issues, which are linked to higher risk of recidivism."),
    ("Family Background", "low", "Growing up in a household with both biological parents does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Religious Beliefs", "low", "Belief or disbelief in God does not significantly predict recidivism.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 85
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 230 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and all of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
